'Wikibooks' (previously called Wikimedia Free Textbook Project and Wikimedia-
Textbooks) is a wiki hosted by the Wikimedia Foundation for the creation of free
content that anyone can edit.

In April 2010, Alexa ranked wikibooks.org as the 2,462 nd most popular
web site in the world. Compete.com estimates that Wikibooks had 576,838 unique
visitors, and Quantcast estimates unique visitors from the United States in that
month. [http://siteanalytics.compete.com/wikibooks.org/ "Site Profile for
wikibooks.org"], compete, retrieved June 15,
2010 [http://www.quantcast.com/wikibooks.org "wikibooks.org"],
Quantcast, retrieved June 15, 2010
